name: Arc-en-ciel Optimism
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand if you control a Light Warrior monster. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Arc-en-ciel" card from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, you can change this card's Attribute. You can only Special Summon 1 "Arc-en-ciel Optimism" per turn.
